title: Missiles at dawn, an EU meeting on Monday
summary_full: With Iran’s supreme leader confirmed dead and the regime’s command structure in disarray, Europe risks reacting at bureaucratic speed to events unfolding at revolutionary pace
summary_public: With Iran’s supreme leader confirmed dead and the regime’s command structure in disarray, Europe risks reacting at bureaucratic speed to events unfolding at revolutionary pace

IR.label: positive
IR.evidence: Iran’s supreme leader confirmed dead and the regime’s command structure in disarray
